title: Thoriq Firdaus
description: Hi, I have been a web developer for more than 8 years, building websites, WordPress themes and plugins.

role.title: Web Developer
role.description: Developed an e-Commerce website using WP-eCommerce, which was the most popular WordPress shopping cart plugin at that time, for a Painted Shoe store of a friend of mine. Optimized the website for Search Engines. Trained developers (from 2011 to 2012).

recommendations.description: I have been using Thoriq's service since I started my online business back in 2009. As a web programmer, he always try his best to accommodate my ideas and inspirations and turn it into a great web display and applications. Personally, I think he is young and independent.

I have worked with Thoriq Firdaus since 2008, he created ecommerce website for my product. He is a bright website creator, he managed to fulfill all the requests that were required for a decent and professional ecommerce website, He also has a good taste of website design.

role.title: Web Developer
role.description: Designing and developing e-Commerce website templates for clients and subscribers. Revamping the Administration interface where users input and manage their products.

role.title: Writer & Editorial Panel
role.description: Writing tips and tutorials on web design and developments. Also Technical Editor for Hongkiat, reviewing technical posts for accuracy and code validity.

recommendations.description: Thoriq is very knowledgeable in his writing scope which made my job as an editor that much easier. He is a great tutorial writer who will go the extra mile to produce content that are easy to read and follow. His "can do" attitude is a strong and infectious motivator, which rubs off on the people who work with him as well. He's a pleasure to work and collaborate with.

role.title: Editorial Panel
role.description: Reviewing WordPress articles submission on a monthly basis. Reviews were made for the content accuracy and the code validity.

role.title: Tutorial Instructor
role.description: Writing tips and tutorials on web design and developments at Tuts+ Web Design, focusing on CSS, HTML, JavaScript, web development tools, and web design frameworks. Also occasionally translating tutorials to the Indonesian.

role.title: Web Developer
role.description: Upgraded and optimized the Hongkiat.com website to follow modern web design standards. Revamped the WordPress theme used at Hongkiat.com with WP-API, Backbone, and Underscores. Developed a number of WordPress plugins used internally.

projects.title: Responsive Web Design by Example
projects.description: Practical examples for developing a stunning responsive portfolio, a product page, and a professional with some of the most popular responsive web frameworks.
